homePage.title: Software Engineer / Photography Enthusiast
homePage.description: A 90s-born tech enthusiast passionate about artistic creation and mastering new skills, blending software engineering with a love for photography.

aboutPage.title: About Me
aboutPage.subtitle: Get to know me better
aboutPage.bioFull: a software engineer who loves technology. In addition to backend development and web design, I'm also passionate about visual arts - from photography to studying filmmaking, these are my interests. I usually enjoy capturing beautiful moments in life through the lens and using various tools for image post-production and creative design. When I'm not coding or shooting, I like to go to the gym to maintain enough physical strength for the work and hobbies I love.
aboutPage.serviceProgramDevelopmentDesc: Specializing in Java backend API development, database architecture design, and custom report generation for robust data solutions.
aboutPage.serviceWebDesignDesc: Focusing on UI design to enhance user experience, incorporating stylistic visual elements to create unique and engaging websites.
aboutPage.servicePhotographyDesc: Providing full pre-production services, including creative concept development, scriptwriting, and detailed storyboarding for impactful visual narratives.
aboutPage.serviceVideoPostProductionDesc: Professional photo retouching, color correction, and video editing with titles, effects, and seamless transitions for a polished final product.
aboutPage.hobbyFilmStudyDesc: In-depth analysis of film aesthetics, narrative structures, and directing techniques to appreciate the art of cinema.
aboutPage.hobbyFitnessSportsDesc: Maintaining physical and mental strength through regular gym workouts and various sports activities.
aboutPage.hobbyTalentExplorationDesc: Continuously learning new skills and exploring creative outlets, from music to digital art.
aboutPage.hobbyCommunicationSharingDesc: Engaging in discussions and sharing knowledge with peers to foster collaborative growth and inspiration.

resumePage.title: Resume
resumePage.subtitle: My Professional Journey & Skills
resumePage.exp1Description:
ERP System Development (Rental Management)

• Developed backend APIs using Spring Boot for rental contracts, client management, and financial reporting modules.
• Designed data models with JPA (Hibernate) and MySQL, optimizing SQL queries to enhance performance.
• Responsible for report development using Stimulsoft to design and generate dynamic statistical data.
• Designed RESTful APIs for frontend integration, providing complete API documentation.

Internal Admin Panel Development

• Designed backend UI with a modular development tool, using JavaScript for screen interactions.
• Implemented query filtering to reduce unnecessary data loading and improve system query performance.
• Developed an auto-fill mechanism to populate information based on user input, reducing manual entry and improving user experience.
resumePage.edu1Description:
Graduation Project

• Developed a navigation app for the Android platform, applying learned programming languages.
• Utilized the Google Maps API for GPS positioning, route navigation, and point of interest information.
• To enhance user experience, self-taught photography and Photoshop to shoot and edit all in-app photos.
resumePage.edu2Title: National Xiluo Agricultural & Industrial Vocational High School
resumePage.edu2Description:
Certifications

• Earned 'Class C Technician for Interior Wiring' and 'Class C Technician for Transformer Installation' certifications through hands-on practice and preparation.

footer.title: Solo Huang
footer.description: In 2025, at the age of thirty, I decided to rekindle my passion and created a platform to record and share my journey. If you also long to discover the freshness and beauty in life, I invite you to follow my journey!
